description: In the shadow of a full moon, Falcon legend Chase Hunter and Lane Fuller explore their forms in the flickering glow of tiki torches.  As fingertips caress and tongues trace fervent designs on eager flesh, these two studs work each other into a frenzy of sexual adoration, devoted cock-sucking, and diligent fucking.
title: Drenched, Part 1:  Soaking It In
